name: splitbrain/dokuwiki
description: DokuWiki is a simple to use and highly versatile Open Source wiki software that doesn't require a database

suggest.ext-mbstring: The mbstring extension is highly reccomended to speed up all UTF-8 handling
suggest.ext-intl: The intl extension allows for better locale specific sorting
suggest.squizlabs/php_codesniffer: PHP_CodeSniffer tokenizes PHP, JavaScript and CSS files and detects violations of a defined set of coding standards.
suggest.phpunit/phpunit: Allows automated tests to be run without system-wide install (only version 4-7 are supported).
